p: The extraction rate of PPEO by the method of cold pressing was 0.82%, which was higher than that in a previous study of citrus essential oils (0.25%) [ 17]. The obtained PPEO was pale yellow and a clear liquid with a natural aroma. Figure 1 shows the total ion chromatogram obtained from GC/MS analysis of the PPEO 10-fold diluted with absolute ethanol. A total of 21 compounds were detected ( Table 1). Among these compounds, 13 were terpenes, which accounted for 94.15% of the total. The highest content of limonene in PPEO was 55.92%, followed by β-myrcene (31.17%), β-pinene (3.16%), ocimene (1.42%), and β-copaene (1.24%) ( Table 1).
